function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Chlorine leakage due to improper handling or storage","Impact":"Health hazards, environmental contamination, and respiratory issues for the nearby population and environment","Mitigation":"Proper training on handling and storage, regular equipment maintenance, and use of safe storage containers","Technologies":"Chlorine gas detectors, leak detection systems, and emergency ventilation systems","People":"Nearby population, workers handling chlorine, environmental stakeholders","Owner":"Facility management, regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Inefficiency or ineffectiveness of chlorine dioxide as a disinfectant","Impact":"Inadequate disinfection of wastewater, leading to the spread of contagious diseases and microbial contamination","Mitigation":"Proper dosing and monitoring of chlorine dioxide levels, regular maintenance of dosing systems, and adherence to recommended usage guidelines","Technologies":"Automatic dosing systems, chlorine dioxide analyzers, and real-time monitoring equipment","People":"Health authorities, wastewater treatment operators, public health organizations","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facility, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Chemical exposure and health risks from chlorine dioxide","Impact":"Respiratory issues, skin irritation, and potential long-term health effects for individuals exposed to chlorine dioxide","Mitigation":"Personal protective equipment, ventilation systems, and strict adherence to safety protocols","Technologies":"Personal protective gear, industrial ventilation systems, and exposure monitoring devices","People":"Workers handling chlorine dioxide, nearby residents, and facility visitors","Owner":"Employers, facility management, occupational health and safety organizations"}]}
